Milestone: The Contracting Officer Representative submits the requisition cover sheet.
The Office of the Chief Financial Officer approves the requisition.
The procurement office assigns a Contracting Officer.
The program office completes and submits the acquisition package.
The procurement office and legal team review the acquisition package.
The procurement office collects bids from eligible vendors.
The Contracting Officer reviews proposals from vendors.
A technical evaluation panel chooses a vendor.
The contracting officer awards the contract.
The Contracting Officer Representative holds a kickoff with the vendor.
The contract ends.
The procurement office closes out the contract.
